ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/20/99 8:07:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Words I sorta know.  You need the ones I do not. Go ahead and give a list.  I do not consider
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/20/99 8:07:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
matthiesenm@... writes:

> Thank you for you response. I am looking for any and all of them. I have
> bought Ice of Velious but failed in my research. Any hints are appreciated.
> Let me know if you need a list of them. I need both words and components.
>
> Eldran

Words I sorta know. You need the ones I do not.

Go ahead and give a list. I do not consider a list of components ... not
attached to the spell that needs them a spoiler (though some may ... so go
ahead and say spoiler in the title of the mail)

Sonoroud Tomebinder
